question: how to prevent stroke?

They should replace refined grains with whole grains whole bread and brown rice, avoid red meat and instead have sea foods eggs beans nuts and seeds as a source of protein. Polypills consisting of combinations of drugs like aspirin statins and blood pressure medication should be consumed on a regular basis. Listed here is a simple step-by-step exercise that can help you overcome your fear of panic attacks: acknowledge - the next time you notice increased anxiety or panic symptoms simply pause and take a breath. by working on changing how you react you can start to remain in control during panic attacks. alternative response - instead of becoming wrapped up in your fear remind yourself that these are simply symptoms of a panic attack and that you have nothing to be afraid of. it is better to see some doctor before taking any medicine as the best medication for your panic attacks will depend on a variety of factors like presenting symptoms co morbid disorders and treatment goals. these three steps can assist you in changing the way you react to symptoms and get through panic attacks with less fear.
